description.value: Unfurling your wings in a quick snap, you send feathers scattering in all directions. Creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] take @Damage[6d6[slashing]] damage (basic Reflex save against your class DC). This increases to @Damage[10d6[slashing]] if your unarmed attacks have a greater striking rune, such as by etching it onto handwraps of mighty blows, and @Damage[16d6[slashing]] if they have a major striking rune.
